Convert FreeSurfer morphometry to GIFTI

Source: R/image-utils.R
fsmorph_to_gifti.Rd

Reads a FreeSurfer morphometry file (.curv, .thickness, .sulc) and writes a GIFTI func file.

Usage

fsmorph_to_gifti(morph_path, output_path = NULL)

Arguments

morph_path

Path to FreeSurfer morphometry file.

output_path

Output GIFTI path. If NULL, replaces the extension with .func.gii.

Value

The output file path (invisibly).

References

Markello RD et al. (2022) Nature Methods 19:1472-1480. doi:10.1038/s41592-022-01625-w
